chantey.title: Knock a Man Down
chantey.text:
I wish I was in Mobile bay, _Way, hey,_ knock a man down, A rolling cotton night and day, _This_ is the time to knock a man down.
I wish I was in New Orleans, Chorus. Where Jackson Gave the British beans, Chorus.
I wish I was at Boston city, Chorus. a walking with my lovely Kitty, Chorus.
I wish I was in New York Town, Chorus. a walking Broadway up and down, Chorus.
I wish I was in Liverpool, Chorus. a going to a Yankee school, Chorus.
